name: 施坤龍
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule: week 1-3 : chapter 12 Electric Forces and Electric Fields; week 4-6:  chapter 13 Electric Potential and Capacitance;  week 7-8: chapter 14 Current and Direct Current Circuits; week 9: Midterm Exam.; week 10-12: chapter 15 Magnetic Forces and Magnetic Fields; week 12-15: chapter 16 Faraday’s Law and Induction; week 15-17: chapter 17 Alternating Current Circuits and Electromagnetic Waves; week 18: Final Exam.
